Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Padiptah; black-glazed beard and lappet wig; flesh-coloured face, now discoloured; line and column of hieroglyphs T-form identifying deceased as priest of Anubis of Rosetjau and Bastet of Ankhtawy; uninscribed back-pillar.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Maj Charles Kerr Macdonald
